alert.note: Alert for Gallatin; Hardin; Pope; Saline (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 31 at 8:54PM CDT until March 31 at 9:15PM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 915 PM CDT FOR HARDIN...NORTHEASTERN POPE...SOUTHERN SALINE AND CENTRAL GALLATIN COUNTIES... At 853 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles south of Equality, or 13 miles southeast of Harrisburg, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Shawneetown around 905 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Old Shawneetown, Karbers Ridge, Junction, Elizabethtown, Gross, Eddyville, Cave-in-Rock and Stonefort. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for southern Illinois. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for southern Illinois...southwestern Indiana...and western and northwestern Kentucky. Remain alert for a possible tornado! Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. If you spot a tornado go at once into the basement or small central room in a sturdy structure. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
